column3: Tweaked based on tester feedback: output amounts with full 8-decimal precision, and support scripthash addresses.\n
Sent you a pull request for this, https://github.com/gavinandresen/bitcoin-git/pull/29\n
Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/dba91a9a6783057d7f308eeabb0ef4a6772c9562 for binaries and test log.\n
